<title level="1" right="Cantrip 2" pfs="Standard">
[Triple Time](/Spells.aspx?ID=1778)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Composition" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=31" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 372 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 60-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

Your music sets a fast pace. You and all allies in the area gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 round.
name: Triple Time
